EmailTemplate.name: AIA ID Card Approval emails
EmailTemplate.subject: {!ID_Card__c.Name} for {!ID_Card__c.Implementation__c} is Verified
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!ID_Card__c.Name} for {!ID_Card__c.Implementation__c} is Verified You may navigate to the ID Card by clicking on the link below {!ID_Card__c.Link}
AIA Automation
